name: 7minutes
description:
Highly recommend to play with a controller.

This is my submission for the Godot Wild Jam #32. The theme of the jam was "seven", so my idea was to give the player seven minutes to power up before fighting a boss. If you die to the boss, you are sent back to the main world and will have to find your items again but your skills are still unlocked.  There will be a warp to go straight to the boss as well! 

This is my second completed jam, and I learned a lot about the engine as well as the gaps in my knowledge.  I've come out of this with a whole list of things to improve on, and a better sense of the work flow needed for such projects. :) 

Controls

Action / Gamepad(Xbox) / Keyboard

Move -> Left Stick | A and D
A - Jump -> A | W or Space
X - Attack - X | J
Open Skills Menu - Select | Q or Tab
Swap weapons - RB | i
Super Move - B | H
Bow - RT | O
Interact - Y | U
Pause - Start | Esc

Check out the credits.txt for a full list of asset attributions.
